repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Artifacts and Relics collection
did.abstract: Artifacts, memorabilia, pins, awards, textiles, and other materials, either related to or produced by Trinity College and Duke University or collected by Trinity College Historical Society or other offices and individuals as historical curiosities.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Artifacts and Relics Collection, Duke University Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Artifacts and Relics Collection were received by the University Archives as both gifts and transfers.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Encoded by Kimberly Sims, November 2007, updated May 2009, updated July 2012
Several accessions were merged into one collection, described in this finding aid.
Accession UA2014.0070 added and finding aid updated by Tracy M. Jackson, December 2014.
Accessions UA2016-0041 and UA2016-0044 added by Tracy M. Jackson, September 2016.
Accession UA2017.0066 and UA2017.0071 added by Tracy M. Jackson, January 2018.
Accession UA2019.0023 and UA2018.0009 added by Tracy M. Jackson, March and August 2019.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Artifacts, memorabilia, pins, awards, textiles, and other materials, either related to or produced by Trinity College and Duke University or collected by Trinity College Historical Society or other offices and individuals as historical curiosities. Includes academic apparel from university leaders, athletic memorabilia, commemorative plates, and shoulder patches from the Armed Forces units that Duke alumni served in.

controlaccess.subject: Armed Forces -- Medals, badges, decorations, etc.

did.unittitle: Items stored in slots
Slot 1: Duke University Service pin, 10 years

Slot 3: Demosthenes Aeschines medal 1851 (debating); to: T.A. Smoot
Slot 4: Trinity College ring, Class of 1917 with yellow ribbon (from Exie Duncan)
Slot 5: Lapel pin with Duke Family Crest, from opening of Washington Duke Inn and Golf Club, December 9, 1988
Slot 6: Duke University Service pin, 30 years (donor: Exie Duncan)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The conservation of the signed championship basketball (1992) was funded by Mrs. Georgeanne C. Corey in memory of George Corey (T'69) through the Duke University Libraries Adopt-a-Book Program.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Dark blue cardigan sweater with large white letter D on left front. Belonged to Raymond E (Buddy) Luper, class of 1945, who lettered in football and baseball. Given by his daughter Anne Schmitt.

did.unittitle: Duke brass belt buckle

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: University seal on left, "DUKE" printed on right
Made by College Seal in Cambridge, Massachussetts

did.unittitle: Iron "T" from entrance gates to Trinity College
Duke shield pin, embroidered

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: From Virginia Louise Totman Cook, accession UA2018.0009.

did.unittitle: Football season towel

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Blue and white towel listing the dates and opponents for Duke Football during the 1941-1942 season, including the 1941/1942 Rose Bowl.

did.unittitle: Trinity College tobacco premium: small rug with figure of fencing man

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 8cm x 13cm, dark blue and white with dark blue fringe; center figure of man holding foil and in fencing stance; upper left image of triangular Trinity flag; upper right image of Trinity College seal; lower right image of triangular Trinity banner; lower left image of Trinity "T".
Gift of Robert R. Penn, Trinity Class of 1974.

did.unittitle: Trinity College tobacco premium: Murad card featuring three running men

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 7cm x 5.5cm; paper card with color image of three men running, Trinity flag and seal behind; gold-colored borded with brand name Murad in blue; text on bottom edge of image reads "Collee Series 26 to 50, 2nd edition"; reverse includes list of colleges and university included in series.
Gift of Robert R. Penn, Trinity Class of 1974

did.unittitle: Trinity College tobacco premium: silk featuring Trinity college seal

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 5cm x 9cm; blue woven silk featuring seal of Trinity COllege in center, word "TRINITY" below; "Egyptienne Luxury" written on bottom; "Factory No 7.3rd. District State N.Y." written along top edge upside-down
Gift of Robert R. Penn, Trinity Class of 1974.
